title: Why not create few new maps for Summoner's Rift?
body: I watched the PROJECT:OVERDRIVE video, and I think if LOL team can create some new maps, I mean, like skins, but for the whole map, with different themes, like ancient cities or future city, and I think people would love to pay for it.

replies.body: Or just a few different skins (like normal Rift, night time Rift, and other skins like snowy, molten, ancient, overgrown, futuristic, void, etc Rift) and then one is randomly selected by the game before each match. So no voting or paying etc, just a steady rotation of different skins each time you play. It could even be like a rare occurrence, like 80% of games have the normal Rift skin, and 20% of the time is on a random Rift skin. Would certainly make those game special.

They can make champion skins, they should be able to make any skins.

That means if we can import our own skins and have our own screen display something else, than why can't we create our own map skins and at least have something to look at on our screen?
Which people do, hence the fan made chroma packs that are actually decent.
Ok there is that, but why can't we the fans make map skins?

Because that would require hours of man work time at the very least.

Champ skins take maybe 10-30 minutes.
One of the reasons for the HUGE SR overhaul was that it would be easier to create skins for the map, such as the good ol' Christmas skin.
Not a bad idea. Same mechanics on the map but different themes.  Could be good
id be first to sign up for this!
